com.saic.uicds.core.em.service

Interface IncidentManagementService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IncidentManagementServiceImpl

    public interface IncidentManagementService
    The Incident Management Service manages the lifecycle of an incident and the sharing of incidents. It processes Incident type work products and creates and updates digests for those work products.

    • Field Summary

        com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.service.impl.ProductPublicationStatus createIncidentFromCap(x1.oasisNamesTcEmergencyCap1.AlertDocument.Alert alert)

        Returns:

      • shareIncident

        boolean shareIncident(org.uicds.incidentManagementService.ShareIncidentRequestDocument.ShareIncidentRequest shareIncidentRequest)
                      throws com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.InvalidInterestGroupIDException,
                             com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.LocalCoreNotOnlineException,
                             com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.RemoteCoreUnavailableException,
                             com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.XMPPComponentException,
                             com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.NoShareAgreementException,
                             com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.NoShareRuleInAgreementException,
                             com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.UICDSException
        Allows the user to share an incident with the specified core.
        Parameters:
        shareIncidentRequest - - this includes the incident ID and the shared core name.
        Returns:
        status - true if successful, otherwise false is return. The error log will be used to log the error message upon failure.
        Throws:
        com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.NoShareRuleInAgreementException
        com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.NoShareAgreementException
        com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.XMPPComponentException
        com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.RemoteCoreUnavailableException
        com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.LocalCoreNotOnlineException
        com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.InvalidInterestGroupIDException
        com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.UICDSException

      • shareIncidentAgreementChecked

        boolean shareIncidentAgreementChecked(org.uicds.incidentManagementService.ShareIncidentRequestDocument.ShareIncidentRequest shareIncidentRequest)
                                      throws com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.InvalidInterestGroupIDException,
                                             com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.LocalCoreNotOnlineException,
                                             com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.RemoteCoreUnavailableException,
                                             com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.XMPPComponentException,
                                             com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.NoShareAgreementException,
                                             com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.NoShareRuleInAgreementException,
                                             com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.UICDSException
        Allows the user to share an incident with the specified core. This a non-endpoint method and is called by other UICDS services/entities (e.g. autoshare) where agreements rules have already been checked and enforced.
        Parameters:
        shareIncidentRequest - - this includes the incident ID and the shared core name.
        Returns:
        status - true if successful, otherwise false is return. The error log will be used to log the error message upon failure.
        Throws:
        com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.NoShareRuleInAgreementException
        com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.NoShareAgreementException
        com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.XMPPComponentException
        com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.RemoteCoreUnavailableException
        com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.LocalCoreNotOnlineException
        com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.InvalidInterestGroupIDException
        com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.UICDSException
